website_summaries.verdict: A great look that offers classic Coach styling and nice construction even though it's not made of real leather - but it comes with a few quirks that may concern some consumers.
pros: Garners praise from those who love Coach for its durable workmanship and classic design
Can be carried with the handles, crossbody, or on the shoulder with the strap
cons: It's not made of genuine leather
The bag has a stiff feel, and not a lot of space for numerous items
Rare complaints of defects upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great purse
customer_reviews.text: This purse is a great size and it is very pretty. From my knowledge of spotting counterfeit purses; I would say that they purse is an authentic COACH purse. I am very happy with my purchase however, there are two things about this purse that are not my favorite. 1.) the "crossbody" strap is not made to be used across the body. I would consider it a shoulder strap. A crossbody purse should hit at your hip or a little below NOT the middle of your stomach. The strap should also be a little thicker. 2.) the handles should be a little wider. If would fit on my forearm better. I think that is more of a personal preference though.
customer_reviews.author: BT53

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bag came with a few defects as shows in the pictures, not sure of its authenticity though..
customer_reviews.author: Reem Bassem

customer_reviews.title: She hated it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Searched for hours to find one she would like. Gave it to her, and she found it to be beyond repugnant. Kinda sucks that I wasted hours of my life on this endeavor. Wife reminded me that it's ok; I'm not supposed to be good at "purses". Just a warning to any other men out there venturing into these unknown waters. This was a strikeout for me. Seller and amazon were great. Returned the evil thing without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Open wide!
customer_reviews.text: I already love Coach products. This bag opens wide so I’m not hunting for things that I put in. Classy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

product_meta.title: Coach Women's Crossgrain Sierra Satchel
product_meta.description:
A rich leather construction lends sophisticated style to your ensemble in this sleek design that sports a removable strap. Outfitted with an array of pockets and a zipper enclosure, this everyday essential effortlessly organizes your personal belongings.

 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :15.43 x 5.5 x 4.57 inches; 1 Pounds
